flipkart_urls.title: Flipkart Product URLs
flipkart_urls.description: List of Flipkart product URLs to scrape reviews from. Click '+' to add more URLs.

max_reviews.title: Maximum Reviews
max_reviews.description: Maximum number of reviews to scrape. Leave empty or set to 0 to scrape all reviews.

use_apify_proxy.title: Use Apify Proxy
use_apify_proxy.description: Enable to use Apify's built-in proxy service (requires Apify subscription). Recommended if getting blocked.

proxy_configuration.title: Proxy Configuration (Optional)
proxy_configuration.description: Custom proxy settings. Leave empty if not using external proxy.
